caption.p: A computed tomography scan of the chest (A and B) shows bilateral, diffusely distributed ground‐glass opacities with superimposed dependent areas of consolidation. Chest X‐ray (C) shows diffuse alveolar opacities of both lung fields. (D) Chest X‐ray with bilateral alveolar opacities and pneumothorax with chest tube in‐situ. (E) Chest X‐ray improvement of bilateral alveolar opacities at 6 weeks of outpatient follow‐up.
